description: The file defines a NotesProvider class that manages the runtime state of notes in a Flutter app. It exposes APIs for loading, filtering, creating, updating, deleting, and toggling favorite status of notes, wrapping a NotesRepository for persistence.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing notes state and providing APIs for filtering, CRUD operations, and favorite toggling in a Flutter app.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider by loading data once and setting the '_initialized' flag.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads data based on current filters.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the search filter and reloads data.

methods.name: toggleFavoritesOnly
methods.description: Toggles the favorites-only filter and reloads data.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and reloads data to include it.

methods.name: editNote
methods.description: Edits an existing note and reloads data.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and reloads data.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status for a note.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by ID from the current cache.
